comment.realname: lifeasdaddy ...a guy, his wife, and their son...
comment.author: 13267298@N00
comment._content: The caption written on the photograph appears to read: MAINE MON'T COM'EE ON "WYOMING" W.R.HEARS - J.W. KELLER R.A.C. SMITH ADM BADGER GEN J AS. WILSON The Maine National Monument Committee was comprised of James Grant Wilson - Chairman William R. Hearst George F. Shrady John W. Keller J. Edward Simmons According to the inscription on the monument itself. (ref. www.nycgovparks.org/sub_your_park/monuments/monument_info... )

comment.author: 34904489@N07
comment._content: lifeasdaddy: Thank you for the additional details regarding this image. We will look into expanding the descriptive information when we update the source record.
